results.title: Skeleton
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “The Human Body”.
A study of the skeleton, the basic framework of the body. Describes the bones that make up various parts of the skeleton and their function in providing support and protection to vital organs and in affording body mobility.

results.title: Everything you always wanted to know about supervision
results.brief_description: Highlights how a supervisor can develop skills to accomplish goals and objectives for the organisation and himself by mastering and consistently executing the fundamentals of supervision: organisation, delegation, communication, disclipine and motivation.

results.title: Erotic ghost story [Widescreen]
results.creator_credit: Ngai Kai Lam, Lan Chan Choi and Diagonal Pictures
results.brief_description: Three beautiful sisters are really Chinese “fox fairies” who have been granted mortal form in return for doing good deeds. If they resist the temptations of the mortal world, they can eventually achieve immortality. One by one, they each meet a mysterious handsome scholar and make wild, abandoned love with him (and occasionally with each other). Each of the sisters deceives the others about their activities, but eventually they all suspect each other. And when fox hair begins to grow on their bodies, the truth is out. They go to confront the scholar, only to find that he is the god of Carnal Desire, Wu Tung. Basically a soft-porn comedy that also features lush cinematography and costumes, and impressive fight sequences. Cast includes Amy Yip, Man Siu, Pal Sin and Kamimura Kyoko. In Cantonese with English subtitles.

results.title: Erikson on Erikson: on developmental stages
results.creator_credit: Thomas Sand and Parents' Magazine Films
results.brief_description: Conversation between Erikson and a group of students at the Erikson Institute, edited from 5 hours of tapes. Deals mostly with the eight stages of human development: everyone’s successive steps of development from birth through adulthood and old age, each one leading to certain gains, and laden with its own specific conflicts.

results.title: Erikson on Erikson: on child care
results.creator_credit: Thomas Sand and Parents' Magazine Films
